attributes.action: restore, with immediate effect, the link between state benefits / pansions and wages. and also to backdate this link to the date that the link was initially broken
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
25 years ago the Government, under Margaret Thatcher, broke the existing link of state benefits and pensions and earnings and linked it to inflation instead. This has resulted in the value of state benefits being eroded plunging claimants into a ever downwards spiraling of the value of the benefits. Pensioners and benefits claimants deserve better.
We need the link restored NOW and also want this link backdated to give us a realistic rate of pansion / benefit
